website_summaries.verdict: A wide-legged jumpsuit that's incredibly soft.
pros: Available in a range of colors
Extremely soft material that’s not see-through
Wide legs are comfortable and airy
Fits well on long and short torsos
cons: Material is a little clingy, may accentuate panty lines

customer_reviews.title: Soooo soft! Perfect for comfy cozy wear!
customer_reviews.text: So I’m about 210 lbs. 5’5, and I got an XL. The material is sooo soft and comfy but with that comes a little clinginess. So you’ll see in the pictures that it shows some of my rolls but I’m planning on wearing it around the house so I don’t care. The softness is Devine though!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Kilcollum

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for a small price
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality for a small price. This jumpsuit is soooo comfy! I’m 5’6” 130lbs and ordered the large. I can wear it flats/sandals but feel it may be too short with heels. Considering buying another color-just so comfy and can be dressed up or down.
customer_reviews.author: andrea Tresaloni

customer_reviews.title: Even fits a long torso!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'8" and 135ish pounds and the medium not only fits, but is long enough to wear flats without looking like I'm preparing for a flood! I have a long torso and anything that is one piece is usually impossible to fit me. I've tried dozens of jumpsuits, including some for over $150 and this one by far fits the best! The fabric is super soft. I bought in black, but will be buying more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Whetten

customer_reviews.title: I'M IN LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Oooommmmggg!! Let me just say, I'm one of those moms who has forgot about herself since kids and doesn't do anything for ME. I clearance shop for me! Well, let's just say I NEED clothes! I ran across these and was skeptical, but sooooo glad I ordered! I ordered two. They fit GREAT and are soooooo freaking comfy!!! I want every color now 😩😩😍😍!
customer_reviews.author: Sam G

customer_reviews.title: True to size.
customer_reviews.text: At first i was not sure to oder it, but i decided to go for it, it look nicer in person, material is very soft fit really great, i received a lot of compliment. Tips: wear it with a wedges, i am 5, 4 and weight 125 pounds went for the small hope this help.
customer_reviews.author: Magdala Angrand

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I am about 5’4” and approximately 190 pounds. So I’m basically short and curvy. I got the XL and other than being a tad too long I think it fits very well. It has plenty of room. I can wear it with wedges with no problem. I will choose to wear it with spanx only for my own self consciousness. Great buy and I plan to buy it in black also.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly did not expect this to work for me but it did! The only thing is the elastic waistband is a bit tight and I wish I could loosen it more. It’s comfy and makes you look so put together with zero effort! I plan to wear with wedges. I’m a size 8, 5’5”, 165 lbs and I got a medium. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: J2ther

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit & Speedy Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly pleased with this purchase. Material is nice once you get (steam) the shipping wrinkles out. Color is the same as it is pictured. Length is great. I’m 5’11’’ tall and 177 lbs and the large fit perfectly. I like that it has pockets. It can be dressed up or down. Haven’t washed it yet. It may need to be dry cleaned to avoid shrinkage. We’ll see.
customer_reviews.author: Kelcy

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and soft, but tough to get off
customer_reviews.text: This jumpsuit is very cute. I'm 5'4, 135lbs and 36D and ordered the small. Fit was perfect. Length was good, but tall buyers beware as I didn't have much room to wear with taller espadrilles. Material soft and pajama-like material. My only issue was the neck opening was too small. In order to go to the restroom, I struggled to get it off over my shoulders. This is the sole reason I am returning it. I'm going to try the V-Neck option as it should be easier to get off.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Beantown Mom

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I am usually hesitant to buy jumpsuits because I am on the shorter side and curvy. I'm 5'2", wear a size 10 or 12 dress, 36DDD. THIS FIT PERFECTLY!! I wore is with a 3" heel. It was the perfect length. The jumpsuit is very comfortable and flattering. You can easily dress this up or wear it very casually. I purchased two colors.
customer_reviews.author: LMG411

customer_reviews.title: This jumpsuit is beautiful. I have received so many compliments on it
customer_reviews.text: This jumpsuit is beautiful. I have received so many compliments on it! It’s darker green than pictured (Forrest green rather than emerald). I ordered a blue one as well and the blue one does not have an adjustable waistband, the pull string is just for looks. The green one actually cinches as tight or loose as you’d like it. I’ll be returning the blue and keeping the green. I’m 5’3’ and ordered a small and the length is PERFECT. I can wear it with flip flops.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than I imagined
customer_reviews.text: This is much cuter than I expected! Material is nice and soft, and I got the black one with a top button closure. It’s the only way to get it on and off. I haven’t worn it for a full day yet, but I’m sure going to the bathroom will be awkward as these kind of outfits usually are. The pants fit a little long, I’m 5’4”, 145 lbs. I got a medium. I’m usually a 4-6 or 28ish in pants.
customer_reviews.author: AMS

customer_reviews.title: Cute style but too long
customer_reviews.text: Green color is very pretty. I ordered a small (I am 5’3” 130lb curvy). The top was a little more snug than I’d feel comfortable in and the length was too long. It was a snug fit in the rear also. Maybe a medium would have worked better but the small was already so long. Overall I just didn’t love it on me but the material is soft and the style is cute. I’m returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn F.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Washed once and the seams unraveled all around the neck area. Very disappointed because I really liked the jumpsuit.
customer_reviews.author: Eternal✝️Bliss🔆

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This type of jumpsuit can pose a problem if you need frequent bathroom breaks, but if you don't mind that, it is a great wardrobe addition. There was no inseam information so I took a chance but for me it was just right (5'5" in a medium). The length is perfect and I like pants to break correctly over my shoe. My ideal inseam is 31-1/2" if that information helps you (longer legs, shorter torso). Will buy in other colors. Oh ... one more thing ... I would not call the legs "wide" - they are not a palazzo style.
customer_reviews.author: PB Tucson

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Stylish!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many many jumpsuits, ultimately, they all go back! Too small, too long, too difficult to go to the bathroom. This jumpsuit changed everything! I'm 5'1" and 138 pounds and I bought a medium. It fit great and is so comfortable. The fabric is light and stretchy, yet not see through. I love the simple lines. And while it was too long in the legs, (everything I buy is), the longer waist just bloused over and still looks nice. It is super easy to get in and out of, so going to the bathroom isn't an issue. The price can't be beat! Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this!!! I ordered a large when I normally wear medium, but I am 5’9 so wanted to be sure it was long enough. It’s a perfect fit and so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Parrish

customer_reviews.title: lovely: lounge to dinner comfort
customer_reviews.text: Great jump suit! Fits perfectly & I am hard to fit. I am 5'10", 165 lbs, broad shoulders. high waist w/long hip line. Long legs, 40-32-40 so I bought XL though I wear 10/12 usually. Perfect fit all around. I was pleased w/ the quality of the fabric. It did not shrink or fade from washing & drying. It is very versitile; lounge around the house to dinner. Easy to dress up! I plan to buy several more.
customer_reviews.author: M Krenz

customer_reviews.title: You Won’t Be Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love, I’m 191lbs / 5’2 / 36D with a small waist and hips and butt, my pants size are 12 if that helps and I ordered size M, the stretch is amazing and you will not be disappointed. I still have a mommy tummy after my baby and this hides everything so yessss I do recommend. I first received a defected romper so I exchanged for a new and I’m super happy
customer_reviews.author: FARA R

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I bought it in blue-XL bc of reviews. Turns out I could have gotten Large, I’m 180-5’7. Thin material but not see through and comfy jumpsuit. Only thing I didn’t like is that it hung low in the crotch area. Not sure if it would have been same with the large.
customer_reviews.author: Aracely Puerto

customer_reviews.title: So soft and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving three stars ONLY because the color was so off. Online it seems more tan and when it arrived it was way more on the brown side than anything. I was a little disappointed but I wore it anyway for my birthday dinner and it was so soft and comfortable. I wore a black cardigan with it just to add some color and it worked out great! I actually purchased it again in Black.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly and looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this jumpsuit in wine and black. Both fit perfectly - with the waistline actually at the waist unlike another jumpsuit I ordered from Amazon. Getting the top over the shoulders is a little awkward but it works. If the jumpsuit falls apart or shrinks ridiculously after the first washing or so, I will update my review. But right now, I am very happy with the purchase! Looks awesome with my long dusters/kimonos.
customer_reviews.author: IAWL

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: I can't get over how cute this is... on everyone. A friend of mine bought this and it looked awesome on her, but she's a few inches taller than me and slightly slimmer. She was trying to talk me into getting one too, but I was worried it would make me look round and frumpy, like my other (dressier) pantsuit. I read all the reviews from people of all body shapes loving how it made them look- THEY ARE RIGHT! This pantsuit is seriously flattering on EVERYONE. Something about the material and design just works and it's soooo comfortable to boot. Don't think about it- just buy it. I can't wait to get another one in a different color!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime K. Jones

customer_reviews.title: PJ soft for work outfit, what not to like?👍😉
customer_reviews.text: Am 5'5", 36-32-40. Bought size M. I need to have it shortened 😝 It's a lil tight to put on the top part and I am afraid I would rip it if I am in a hurry to use the bathroom 😁 but once in, it fits me fine, however, the top part is not drapped over the waistband like in the pictures so am thinking to buy another color in size L, maybe it will? 😁 The material is super soft and comfortable but it seems it wrinkles easy? We shall see after use. I know when it came in the mail, it was super wrinkly and I HATE to iron clothes 🤪
customer_reviews.author: g0dd3ssbal1

customer_reviews.title: My new Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I want this in every color they have! I love the fit and I love the style! The opening at the back is a bit larger than I personally am comfortable with, but it's fine because I dress this up anyway with a black jacket for work, or with a tank top underneath if it's more casual. I'm 5'3" and 165lbs, I ordered a Large and it's a bit long in the legs (no surprise there!) but pair it with the right shoes and there's no problem, this is line dry so don't commit if you don't want to deal with the higher maintenance! But I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Soto

customer_reviews.title: Top Flight Jumpsuit of the World
customer_reviews.text: 1. Stretchy Material 2. True to Size 3. Functional Stretch belt in the waste band, tight but with much wear im sure it will loosen up, opted in for a replacement belt 4. Functional pockets, deep enough for android 10 phone. 5. Comfortable but thin so shapewear and non bright undergarments are a must 6. On time shipping was a plus 7. Floor length with flats and a wedge sandal 8. Pattern was as posted on site 9. Lots of compliments, so buy it and no regrets 10. For reference: Xl and 16 in pants, plush thighs, backside full.
customer_reviews.author: EssentialDarkness

customer_reviews.title: Very Flattering and Comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: This green jumpsuit was EVERYTHING I was looking for-affordable, comfortable and quick shipping. I would highly recommend. It arrived very wrinkled though. Just for reference I am 4'11 and I wore flat sandals with no problem. I purchased a large and normally have problems in chest (38I) and/or hip area (50). This fit perfect! I plan to purchase more colors soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incorrectly Constructed
customer_reviews.text: The top half and the bottom half of this jumpsuit we’re facing opposite directions! I put the jumpsuit on with the button in the back like the picture shows and thought that it really needed a drawstring at the waist. I looked in the mirror and realized that the drawstring was in the back. Then I noticed the pockets were facing the back too. Probably a one off situation, but still disappointed. The fabric was soft and I’m sure I would have liked this if it weren’t constructed incorrectly.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Amantine

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in green, which is a deeper green than shown. I like it better than the lighter green depicted. I'm 5'2", 120lbs and the small fit perfectly. It's a lightweight jersey material and should be perfect for casual entertaining this summer. Since it's still winter here I'm pairing it with a silk jacket/shirt and it looks adorable. The one caution is that every line shows, so you'll need something like Spanx undie-tectables unless you decide to go commando. I definitely recommend this jumpsuit!
customer_reviews.author: MajorB

customer_reviews.title: the length is perfect. I want to keep it more casual and ...
customer_reviews.text: The jumpsuit is lovely. I am 5'1" and the fit is maybe, about 2 inches too long. If you plan on wearing heels, to dress it up, the length is perfect. I want to keep it more casual and wear it with flats.The material is soft and the color, (burgundy/maroon) depending on your view is great. Depending on your body proportions this can be clingy.I ordered a small. My top is a 34D.
customer_reviews.author: JuliaBlu

customer_reviews.title: Elastic waistband is not adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in the smallest size as something comfy to wear during quarantine, but it’s not an outfit I reach for often. I’m 5’2. This is a little long in me. It works fine with wedges. Also, besides the waist ties, the waist has a thick elastic band inside which is not adjustable. I’m very small framed with a 24” waist, and the band does touch around my waist. If I were going out and about, it wouldn’t bother me at all, but for lounging at home, I’d rather something a little looser.
customer_reviews.author: Zrr

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and comfortable but...
customer_reviews.text: Well it does look as pictured and feels very soft, but my husband says it looks like something someone wears when they are in a cult. Lol. Not the look I was going for, but extremely comfortable and light weight. Anyway if you have any cellulite be prepared for it to show in the butt area because it does cling like underwear. It also has a button in the back near neck which doesn’t make it fun to go to the bathroom considering I have to unbutton and take off like a onesie. I’m 5’6 and weigh 145 lbs and the small fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: PJs
customer_reviews.text: This jumpsuit is SO comfortable, it’s like wearing PJs. I don’t think this jumpsuit is “fancy” and I wouldn’t wear it to work or going out. But is so easy to throw on and be comfy. I’d wear it everyday if I could. Being 5’8” and 120 lbs, I was pleasantly surprised at how long the legs are. Typically the legs are so short on jumpsuits but these are really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: So soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love this jumpsuit. It is comfortable and soft, you feel like you are in your pjs!! You can dress the outfit up or down depending on your accessories. The green is a deep forest green and is really pretty. I have washed and dried it with no issues. It is a pain to iron...but I hate ironing...
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Peters

customer_reviews.title: This was such a good buy!
customer_reviews.text: This jumpsuit is by far the most comfortable item of clothing I own! It's great, because not only is it comfortable, it can be dressed up or down, and I slip it on and go, without having to coordinate a top or bottom- an absolute must for me, as a first- time mom. I bought two more colors, and I'll be buying more, for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Globetrotter

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute I usually wear size 12 however I have a mommy pouch! :/ so I got a large but wish I would’ve got an xL I feel like that would’ve loosened up in that area! Other than that super cute light weight for summer! Maybe I’ll try some spanx underneath!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Bar

customer_reviews.title: COMFORT & STYLE
customer_reviews.text: I am all about comfortable clothing that is stylish. This fits the criteria. Very cute on. Can be dressed up/down (heels/sandals/jewelry). Has a nice fit . . . . . and did I mention comfortable. The material is soft and not see through. Love this. Have not washed it yet, so I don't know whether or not it will shrink. I will update once I do the wash test.
customer_reviews.author: IAMMRSGRAHAM

customer_reviews.title: Not for the shorter, curvier women
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 12, 160 lbs, 5’3” with a bit of a leftover baby tummy....this was not flattering on me at all. It was extremely long - even if it had fit elsewhere, I would have definitely needed to get it hemmed. It was tight in the butt and the mid section just didn’t sit right anywhere I tried to put it. I would imagine this would fit a taller, skinner person well, but it’s definitely not made for my body type. Seems to be made well though. Soft material.
customer_reviews.author: Acarleenb23

customer_reviews.title: Not for bumps and lumps
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this but it runs very small and the fabric is very thin so it show off all the lumps and bumps you have - I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Marysadventure

customer_reviews.title: cheap fabric
customer_reviews.text: I loved this jumpsuit. The only complaint is the knee stretches out when you sit and you wind up with those baggy knee pouches when you stand up. So the fabric is cheap and thin. It did shrink after washing but I lay it out and manually stretch the fabric and then let it air dry. I'm 5'7" and 125 lbs and got a medium. I like the comfort for plane travel and had no issues getting it off to go to the bathroom. Other than the knees stretching out its a great outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and cute! Lightweight, stretchy material in a beautiful jewel green color. The fit was perfect. I'm 5'6", 120 lbs and the size Small was long enough and was loose enough to look like the picture here. My husband says all the time that he is jealous he can't wear "pajamas" out in public like me.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy M

customer_reviews.title: Average at best and lots of wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: It’s average. I like the color and the fabric is soft, but it’s too thin and cheap. There is not enough time in the day to iron out all the wrinkles and I can’t imagine doing that every time I wash it. Enlarge the online photo and look at the bottom of the pants. You can see all the wrinkles. The fabric is not tight but since it is thin and soft it will outline your waist and behind. I’m 5’8, 127 lbs, and ordered Medium. I would need heels or a wedge if I was keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Dana M

customer_reviews.title: CUTE BUT 2ND ONE RIPPED AT THE NECKLINE SEAM
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this jumpsuit. It's cute, it's flattering, and it can be dressed up or down. It's so comfortable you feel like you're wearing pajamas. I bought one. Eventually, the seam at the neckline separated. Instead of sewing it, I purchased a new one. Guess what? It happened again. I'll sew it this time and hopefully that will do the trick. Super frustrating...Otherwise it's adorable and I'll continue to wear it.
customer_reviews.author: JustMe

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this, but...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this jumped since I've been looking for a jumper. My husband said it looked like pajamas. I also didn't like how challenging the button in the back was to hook and unhook. Would probably become an issue every time I needed to use the bathroom. I ended up returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: Wife put on today for the first time and Had a hole in it in one of the seams. And black stuff on the front
customer_reviews.author: Burton Ray Jones

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable outfit that can be dressed up or down
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews I went with the Large however I think the XL would have fit just a little bit better. I still love the jumper and will wear it. I would just prefer a little more looser look. I feel like it’s a little too snug around my stomach and that’s the area I want concealed. The rest is a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: BoyMom05

customer_reviews.title: Strange fit
customer_reviews.text: short in the body long in the legs. Material was nice. String was crazy long and didn’t sinch up right. It was very strange looking. If you have a short torso it might work. I returned mine
customer_reviews.author: Tmc

customer_reviews.title: Neck to high and length too long
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this jumpsuit. I ordered for working from home. It could easily be used for pajamas because it is sooooo soft. But, I had to return it because the neckline was way too high. It would need to be adjusted by a tailor, which is not feasible given how inexpensive it is. Also, I am 5'4" and this jumpsuit was much too long and would have needed alternations to the length as well so it had to go back.
customer_reviews.author: E_Galan

customer_reviews.title: Jumpsuit was just what i expected!
customer_reviews.text: The fit is just sized as listed, if you're between sizes I would size down. I'm an 8 and ordered a medium...maybe could have gone to small but I am long waisted so medium was good for that. Perfect for travel as it can be dressed up or down. Very comfy, washes nicely:) Dryer low and hung up slightly damp. it does take time to dry. Honestly for the price it's a good buy and material better than i expected.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie Celvenger

customer_reviews.title: SOOO comfy !!!
customer_reviews.text: Im 5'7", 210lbs. I went with the XL and it fits really nice. SOOOO comfy. Im pear shaped so I wouldn't wear it out because I'm self conscious. Though I may throw a long button down top to go out with it. Im so honna buy more colours!
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Great, flattering, and very comfortable. I get lots of compliments when I wear this. I bought this in two colors and I love both. I can wear it to work and on the weekends. You can't really dress it up, but I'd consider this dressy-casual anyway because of the wider leg. The legs are a little long (I'm 5'6" and they skim the floor in flat shoes). Just know this is not a well crafted jumpsuit. I don't think it will fall apart on you but the edges are unfinished and the material is fairly thin. You can wear it in summer and fall comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Like wearing pajamas all day
customer_reviews.text: Very soft material. I am 5’5 about 140lbs, and it is a tad long. Not dragging, but room for heels if wanted. Easy to put on and off, not like some jumpsuits.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie L. Levanduski

customer_reviews.title: Very cute & so comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: This is very cute! It looks just like the ones I've seen sold from botiques. It's VERY comfortable!! It is long on me (I am 5'2) but with the way the elastic is, you can fold it under, it pulls it up but it looks good, you cannot tell. Very cute & comfy! I have not washed it to tell how it hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Chic comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly! Soft comfortable light material. Very flattering. Material was very wrinkled when arrived. I washed and hung on padded hanger folding over at the elastic waist it dried in shape, not as many wrinkles. Love it! Not sure what will happen if placed in dryer?
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Easy wear!,,
customer_reviews.text: One of the nicest jumpsuits I have ever owned. Great fabric, soft and comfortable. Able to dress up for Fall and winter evening wear by adding a light weight jacket or sweater. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Limequeen

customer_reviews.title: Wine red
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered a large because of a review that I saw. When it came it wasnt the fit that I was going for. I Returned it and ordered a size Medium, much better fit. I am tall 5'6" 145lb . I didn't want it to short or too tight. Medium was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: kch

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first jumpsuit I’ve worn and I LOVE IT. I seriously wore it for two days straight. It is so comfortable and so cute on. I got the black and it is great for pairing with basic flip flops for running around in or with something a little nicer for dinner. I’m 5-6 and a solid woman’s size 8 and I got the large. You won’t regret buying this!
customer_reviews.author: JBR

customer_reviews.title: This jumpsuit tho!! Yussss
customer_reviews.text: What can I say I love it!! It’s like u don’t feel it on ! Now ima a black chick and don’t have a lot of butt! So this makes it look great Yuss ! I’m 42dd with a little stomach Like pouch - nothing serious or hangage. And I have average rolls on back! But this makes you look well put together! With some jewelry you can pull it together I’m going-NOO!! I must buy more
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of washes it the seams have come loose, wasted money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I liked this one piece outfit. If I had to say anything negative, its that it was too big in the crotch area. Everything else was a go. I generally order a XL in everything but this, I literally could have gone down a size just because the crotch was sagging. Only if I had nuts. Not too bad though. I may order a Large in another color.
customer_reviews.author: SBooker

customer_reviews.title: Can I get another one please
customer_reviews.text: So I’m not a jumper person however this piece of clothing has changed my life. I love the material soft and some what stretches. I have received so many compliments. I love how it fits altogether and I’m planning on ordering another one in a different color and the long sleeve one. I like this jumper a lot
customer_reviews.author: Miss A

customer_reviews.title: Sooo cute
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute piece. It is covering but also lightweight and very comfortable, without looking comfortable. One of my very favorite things in my closet. It’s not see through but it’s not too thick either.
customer_reviews.author: julia

customer_reviews.title: Soft fabric
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about ordering,because I’m curvy, and overweight, but the reviews were great so I took a chance, and I’m so happy I did,the material is soft and it just flows on my body,I felt very attractive because it’s so flattering and it was the perfect length for me, which was a concern of mine because I’m short,I’m 5’3, and normally they are always too long for me,I love it and I’ll probably order in more colors,you can dress it up,you can wear with cute sneakers or you can just lounge around and still feel great,thanks so much,it excelled my expectations
customer_reviews.author: carmen cortes

customer_reviews.title: Casual and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was in search of a casual romper I could wear around the house and/or run errands in. This romper definitely fit the bill. I ordered a Large just in case it shrinks, etc. I washed it before wearing it and it fit perfectly. I love that it has pockets and semi-loose fit. So comfortable and flattering. Hides the belly well. Can’t beat the price either.
customer_reviews.author: Thuy Tran

customer_reviews.title: Its good.
customer_reviews.text: Ok. I am 5'8" and 185, The XL fits fine, and I like the purchase. My only critique would be to get rid of the grasping elastic band. It has a drawstring already in it, but the elastic band grabs on so much that in renders the drawstring pointless. Very soft, very black, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Like wearing pajamas at work
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about you, but I hate dressing up for work. If I have to sit at a computer all day, I don't want to do it in a dress. That's where this jumpsuit comes in. It is soft and comfortable. I feel like I could curl up and go to sleep in it. Bonus: I got a ton of compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: Christine White

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It’s way too long on the leg length but I’am 5’1 so it’s inevitable. The elastic around the waist was a bit too tight but was corrected when I simply removed it. I feel more comfortable with just the drawstring. I seriously lived in it over a weekend. I’m definitely gonna buy the other styles. Bust: 36 Waist line: 29 Hips: 34 Height: 5’1
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Zegarra

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. Got tons of compliments
customer_reviews.text: I could've gotten a medium instead of a large. It still fot okay. Very comfortable. Got tons of compliments. I bought the wine/burgundy jumpsuit. I plan on purchasing different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Neisha

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is super soft. However, mine arrived today, 3 days late, stained. The entire front is covered in what looks like ink almost as if it transferred from something. I have already pretreated and washed. No luck it won't come out. Only plus is I am working from home so no one will see me anyway.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I got ten purple red. The color is perfect. It is super comfortable material and very stretchy. Size down. I got the medium based on size chart and reviews and it is huge on me. I’m going to keep it for lounging around because it is comfy. I’m 5’4 and approx. 135 I should have gotten a small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and flattering
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure of which size to order so I figured I'd post to assist others. I'm 5'4" and 128 lbs. with a curvy backside and usually wear a size 6 in pants. The small fits perfectly- not too big and drapes nicely on the legs. I didn't find the legs too long like some of the other reviewers, and I'm wearing nearly flat shoes. The fabric is opaque and soft, but invisible underwear is a must for no panty lines. Easy to get on and off. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: slw

customer_reviews.title: Yyyyyuuuuuusssssss betch
customer_reviews.text: I have never worn or owned a romper. This is my first experience and I LOVE IT. The fabric reminds me of a well used favorite T-shirt. The fabric is soft but not shear. It can be down or up dressed depending on shoes and accessories. I am 5’3 and the length is perfect (at my heels - I like my pant leg a bit longer). I would buy this again. May have to. Not taking it off. 😝
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Yarovinsky

customer_reviews.title: Super cute jumpsuit
customer_reviews.text: This jumpsuit is super cute and nice quality. Unfortunately I had to return it because the waist was quite a bit too bit. However, I'm pretty small (5'3" 103lbs) so many times the smalls are too big on me. So if you normally wear a small this is a really cute jumpsuit and would be very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: pcpeanut

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Just a mirror selfie, but believe me, this thing is comfortable! It was like wearing pajamas all night! Looked dressy enough to wear to dinner yet comfy enough to curl up on the couch and watch a movie!
customer_reviews.author: NikkiJP17

customer_reviews.title: Not for people with a longer torso
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of jumpsuits on people but can never seem to pull them off. I am only 5'2" but I have a longer torso and a small waist with wider hips. Jumpsuits always seem to come up too high at the cinched waist mark. I would love to find one that cinched more at the hip area. I returned. Oh well, I will keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: ms_burke

customer_reviews.title: material Too thin
customer_reviews.text: Cute, comfy and fit well. However it is EXTREMELY see-through! For almost $40 I expect something of a little more quality. You could see my nude color bra under it with no problem (i purchsed the darker blue with flowers on it). Im 5'4 190 lbs hips are 42" chest 39" and waist 35". Pants were a great length (usually way too long) and fit well everywhere else. Would have kept if material was thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Huffman

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I like the comfort of the jumpsuit, so I have purchased several brands through Amazon. The Lainab is my favorite for fit. So far, I have purchased six. Obviously, I love this jumpsuit.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Ross

customer_reviews.title: Shrunk a lot
customer_reviews.text: Fit well... until the wash. It shrunk up quite a bit. Would probably fit ideally on someone shorter than me. I am 5’6 but I have wide hips and I was sad to see that it shrunk so much even with air drying that I couldn’t wear it any longer. Neckline stitching came undone. Something I could have fixed myself but wasn’t going to wear it since it shrunk so much
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Faria

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: Y’all I love this outfit. So comfy and professional enough for work. Will be ordering more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine J

customer_reviews.title: Fits Tall Women!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6' tall and the legs are long enough for me. I normally wear a 34" inseam, so these are just wonderful! They are comfortable and flowy material; very light and airy to wear. Can be used for casual or more dressy attire. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: It'll do.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure it's super flattering on me but it's incredibly comfortable and will be a good comfy outfit for vacation. I'm 5'10 and 220 and the XL was long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It fit nicely, but...
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'4, 38-35-44. XL fit well. Fabric is a jersey material. darker green color hides the imperfections. However, the neckline is very snug. Felt like I was constricted. Just need more room around my neck. (my neck is not big at all!) I wish this came in a v-neck. Sadly, had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Steffie

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly like pictured. I wear size 0 and sometimes even buy shorts from the kids section so I was hesitant to buy this one. But the xs fits perfectly. I’m 5”6 and the length is just right. Super comfortable material, airy and light. Will use this when traveling long flights.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great & is super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’2” 160# and ordered a large. It fits great & is super comfortable. The legs are a little long, so I plan to wear 2” wedge heels. Very flattering, too! Think this can easily be dressed up or down. Purchased to wear on plane while traveling. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: perfet
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect. 5'2'', 170lbs, 34 DDD bought medium. fits great. soft cotton fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: Super cute especially if you break it up with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Super cute especially if you break it up with a jean jacket or cardigan. Definitely didn’t think about the challenge it would be to use the bathroom... lol that’s the only complaint. I have received so many compliments
customer_reviews.author: SKB

customer_reviews.title: Very Flattering Jumpsuit
customer_reviews.text: This jumpsuit is very pretty. The only reason I gave it 4 Stars is because of the length. I wouldn't recommend for women under 5'2" unless you're wearing 4 inch heels. Otherwise it's a keeper. Nice material and fit. I would also say it's true to size, as I wear a 12 and a large is a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's large on me.
customer_reviews.text: it's large on me. The button closure loop is too small and the button hangs on a long string that would break just trying to get the button into the loop. However the material is nice. I ordered the same jumpsuit without sleeves because the material is so nice. No button to worry about.
customer_reviews.author: paz

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised!
customer_reviews.text: The jumpsuit was a surprisingly good fit, even the length was perfect whether wearing flats or heels. I am 5'7'' and weigh about 130 pounds. I ordered the medium in the olive color. However, I did return the short sleeve version and ordered the same one with the long sleeves, and it is still a perfect fit. Be prepared for some wrinkles, though.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love how comfortable this is! So soft! Looks good dressed up or dressed down. Want one in every color!!
customer_reviews.author: HappyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Flattering style
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I put it on I knew I loved it Fit perfectly. I am 5ft 7 and usually wear a size 6/8 top and size 8 bottoms. I ordered a medium and was very happy with that size. Material very soft. Feels like wearing pjs. Will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: catherine MA

customer_reviews.title: ABOUT THE REFUND...NOT GIFT CARD
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t the color I was expecting..asked for gray but looked more like brown, I returned it at kohl’s along with another order of straw hats which were not what was described....instead of a refund amazon gave me a gift card credit...why..❓I wanted the refund back on my card not a gift card. Have been trying to contact amazon to see if they couldn’t reverse it and put it back to my cc..going on a cruise in 5 days and could’ve use that refund on my trip
customer_reviews.author: clb

customer_reviews.title: So soft and easy to wear
customer_reviews.text: Love this jumpsuit. I was skeptical when I bought it but its so soft and comfy. The material is on the thinner side but I wear yoga pants or leggings underneath if Im wearing out in public. Im a curvy short woman and this is super flattering.
customer_reviews.author: Kel-Z

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and style
customer_reviews.text: This jumpsuit is as soft and comfortable as it could possibly be. The dark green is jewel tone and absolutely beautiful. I am 5’8 and about 155, and the large fits beautifully. It is exactly the right length to with my fit flops, which have about an inch and a half platform. It looks much more expensive than it was.
customer_reviews.author: L. Borgia

customer_reviews.title: comfy pjs but not a two piece
customer_reviews.text: I didn't pay attention and thought this was a two piece set. So when I pulled it out of the wrapper, I was surprised to have a jumper in my hands. I think I look kind of silly in it, but it's something comfortable to wear at home at least.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised! Great Jumpsuit 🖤
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect much but I was very pleasantly surprised by this jumpsuit! I love it! It's so comfortable and versatile. You can easily dress it up or down, and it looks more expensive than it actually is. Definitely getting it in more colors 👍🏼 It fits true to size so get your regular size.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great value!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this jumper! I bought a medium - I am 5'1" and 155lbs and it's the perfect fit. The length is even great for my height, which is usually the hardest part! I can wear flat shoes and blouse the top a little or wear it with heels, probably 2ish inches and it's still long enough. It's soft, comfy and flattering on the lower half.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cowan

customer_reviews.title: Too bad that it was made so poorly
customer_reviews.text: Came with a tear in the material. Thought I would it. Wore it once. Button came off. Too bad that it was made so poorly. I had one of every color in my cart. Wont be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Boston

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It is falling apart. The thread is coming out everywhere after only one wear. See photos. Only two pictures but could add one for every aspect of this outfit. The first pic is the neckline and the last is the waistline. Do not recommend. Only reason for two stars is the color and fit were both spot on. Will never buy from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Levine

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! This is super cute, fit perfect, REALLY comfy, and the material is good quality. Light enough for summer but good weight so that you can tell that it's made well. Could dress it up by adding a belt, jewelry, and heels. But it's a perfect casual outfit. Feels like PJ's!! Can't wait to wear this on my summer vacay. I'm 5'5", 119 lbs, and ordered a small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: LAINAB Women's Short Sleeve Loose Wide Legs Casual Jumpsuits with Pockets
feature_bullets: Material: 95% RAYON 5% SPANDEX Fabric:comfy and stretchy.Lightweight but not see through
This fashion jumper is super soft and freaking comfy.Look dressy but feels like pajamas
Design：Round Neck, Long Pants, Side Pockets.Button keyhole closure at the back of the neck.Easy to put on/get off.Pull on closure
Loose fitiing,high elastic waist with comfy adjustable waistband.Loose wide pant legs,hide flaws well.
Perfect to dress up with a jean jacket or cardigan.Good length, suit to pair with flats,sandals,heels,wedges,sneakers
Great for work,party,church,vacation,beach and casual entertainning.
Easy Garment Care.No shrinking and fading after washing.
